entities.name: albus
entities.description: Albus is mentioned as the password to get into a secure location. ("Password was ‘Albus’ ! Get in here, Harry.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who receives the password and is called upon to enter a secure location. ("Get in here, Harry.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is present with Hermione when they receive the radio broadcast. ("Harry hurried back inside the tent to ﬁnd Ron and Hermione kneeling on the ﬂoor beside the little radio.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is present with Ron when they receive the radio broadcast. ("Harry hurried back inside the tent to ﬁnd Ron and Hermione kneeling on the ﬂoor beside the little radio.")

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan is a familiar voice that comes over the radio broadcast. ("‘ . . . now found ourselves another secure location,’ Lee was saying,")

relationships.description: Harry receives the password 'Albus' to enter a secure location. ("Password was ‘Albus’ ! Get in here, Harry.")

Lee Jordan mentions that the radio broadcast was interrupted by Death Eaters making house calls in their area. (" . . . apologize for our temporary absence from the airwaves, which was due to a number of house calls in our area by those charming Death Eaters.")
